universum.studios.android.preference

Class PreferencesManager.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • universum.studios.android.preference.SimpleSharedPreferencesFacade.Builder<PreferencesManager.Builder>
      • universum.studios.android.preference.PreferencesManager.Builder
  • Enclosing class:
    PreferencesManager

    public static class PreferencesManager.Builder
extends SimpleSharedPreferencesFacade.Builder<PreferencesManager.Builder>
    Builder that may be used to creates new instances of PreferencesManager with a desired configuration.

    Required parameters

    • none
    Author:
    Martin Albedinsky

      Creates a new Builder with the specified context.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Builder

        public Builder(@NonNull
               Context context)
        Creates a new Builder with the specified context.
        Parameters:
        context - The context that is used to create default preferences instance for this builder if there is no explicit instance of preferences specified.

    • Method Detail

      • preferencesName

        public PreferencesManager.Builder preferencesName(@Nullable
                                                  String name)
        Specifies a name for shared preferences that is used to create default preferences instance in case when there is no explicit instance of preferences specified for this builder via SimpleSharedPreferencesFacade.Builder.preferences(SharedPreferences).

        Also the specified name may be used later in order to identify preferences instance via PreferencesManager.getPreferencesName().

        Parameters:
        name - The desired name for preferences. May be null in order to use default name for preferences.
        Returns:
        This builder to allow methods chaining.
        See Also:
        SharedPreferencesPolicy.defaultPreferencesName(Context)

      • preferencesFileMode

        public PreferencesManager.Builder preferencesFileMode(int fileMode)
        Specifies a file mode for shared preferences that is used to create default preferences instance in case when there is no explicit instance of preferences specified for this builder via SimpleSharedPreferencesFacade.Builder.preferences(SharedPreferences).

        Also the specified mode may be used later in order to identify preferences file mode via PreferencesManager.getPreferencesFileMode().

        Parameters:
        fileMode - The desired file mode for preferences. Should be one of modes defined by @SharedPreferencesPolicy.FileMode annotation.
        Returns:
        This builder to allow methods chaining.

      • build

        @NonNull
public PreferencesManager build()
        Builds a new instance of PreferencesManager with the configuration specified for this builder.
        Overrides:
        build in class SimpleSharedPreferencesFacade.Builder<PreferencesManager.Builder>
        Returns:
        Instance of preferences manager ready to be used.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If some of the required parameters is missing.
